settings.title: The World’s First Smart Ukulele
settings.subtitle: Fast & Fun
settings.text: Bringing technology and music together to make a truly unique, fun, and quick learning experience for beginners and advanced players alike.

settings.title: Music Library
settings.caption:
Learn to play your favorite songs in our music library that is continuously updated.

Can't find your favorite? Let us know, we'll add it!

settings.title: The Populele App
settings.subtitle: Play & Learn
settings.text: A place to teach yourself the ukulele; A music tool center presenting tuner, chord library, and more; A song library supporting your music dream.

settings.title: Download
settings.subtitle: Android & iOS
settings.text: Compatible with most of the smart devices on the market.

settings.quote: "Like any stringed instrument, learning chords is a bit of pain. We can solve this with technology."
"It connects to an app where users can get instant feedback and correct themselves."
"A wild new startup is about to unleash Populele, an electric Ukulele that will teach you how to play old Uke standards like Ukulele Lady, D’yer Maker, and Tiptoe Through The Tulips."
"This is an awesome ukulele: fun, educational, and just plain cool; it's a really good entry-level uke in its own right, it's a lot of fun to play with the app, too."

settings.title: Game Mode
settings.caption: Learn ukulele skills with fun! Strumming, plucking, chord switching, and more.

settings.title: Tools
settings.caption: Find tuner, chord library, and other useful tools all in one app. Turn on the dazzle mode or light up your own LED pattern and let your music shine!

settings.title: Song Library
settings.caption: Learn over 100 songs in your library. Can’t find your favorite songs? Tell us. We’ll add them for you.

settings.title: Record & Share
settings.text: One-click record and share your new, multi-track work.

settings.title: Premium Quality
settings.subtitle: Wireless & LEDs
settings.text: Smart fretboard lights up to show exactly where your fingers go.

settings.title: Introduction
settings.caption: With ease and fun, unlock your ukulele skills all by yourself and enjoy being your own teacher!

settings.title: Tuning
settings.caption: Tune your ukulele right here, any time. Find more useful tools in the App. Prepare yourself in the most convenient and precise way.

settings.title: Million Years Ago
settings.caption: We demonstrate every single chord for you. Watch and practice the chords any time and as many times as you want!

settings.title: Populele Originals - Live Your Beliefs
settings.caption: Be inspired. Be creative. Share your originals with friends.

settings.title: Introducing Populele

settings.title: NEWSROOM
settings.caption: This real Uke's 72-LED smart fretboard connects with our app via Bluetooth to show exactly how to play your favorite songs, giving beginners a quick and satisfying way to start their musical journey, and helping the experienced take their repertoire to the next level.
If you like to linger where it's shady the Populele want to linger too
settings.content: If music be the food of love then get ready to hit the Old Country Buffet. A wild new startup is about to unleash Populele, an electric Ukulele that will teach you how to play old Uke standards like Ukulele Lady, D’yer Maker, and Tiptoe Through The Tulips.

settings.caption: The World's First Smart Ukulele
settings.content: The company says it's like a "real life Guitar Hero" for the ukulele.

settings.caption: This Smart Ukulele Will Teach You to Play at Your Own Pace
settings.content: What if that teacher were the instrument itself? There is now a smart ukulele that can teach you how to play through tech applications and interactive lessons.

settings.caption: Follow-me learning ukulele is promised to get you playing in minutes
settings.content: Light-led learning is a great way to nail full songs in double quick fashion. Joining follow-me LED system for piano and guitar is the Populele.

settings.caption: The Populele taught me how to play ukulele in 15 mins
settings.content: If you want to learn a chord on Populele, you tap that chord in the app and the finger positions light up. This doesn't just help you play the chord that one time, but gives you a mental picture of the chord that made it easier for me to remember.
